snippet: Every president makes statements as a candidate that he later comes to regret once he is in the White House. If Mitt Romney is elected this fall, he may look back at his comment Friday as one of those.
abstract: Every president makes statements as a candidate that he later comes to regret once he is in the White House. If Mitt Romney is elected this fall, he may look back at his comment Friday as one of those.

headline.main: Romney May Come to Regret Comment on Job Creation
